name: CupofJoy
0:
”Alexa, open cup of joy”
”Alexa, ask cup of joy how to make hot chocolate”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cup of joy
des:
On a cold winter night, snuggle up with a warm throw and a hot cup of joy!
Learn how to make -
*Ginger chai
*Masala tea
*Hot chocolate
*Turmeric milk
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
